original_text: The king will say to those people who are on his right side, “Come here. My Father has been good to you. He has prepared a place for you in his kingdom. That kingdom has been ready for you since the time that God made the world.
korean_text: 그 때에 임금이 그 오른편에 있는 자들에게 이르시되 내 아버지께 복 받을 자들이여 나아와 창세로부터 너희를 위하여 예비된 나라를 상속받으라

sentences.original_text: The king will say to those people
who are on his right side
My Father has been good to you.
He has prepared a place for you
That kingdom has been ready for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그 왕국은 너희를 위해 준비되어 있었다

sentences.original_text: since the time that God made the world.
